General.Name: Longwell Co
General.Description: Longwell Company, together with its subsidiaries, produces and sells electronic components and cable products in worldwide. The company offers raw cables, power cords, charging couplers, wire harness, Hi-amp cables, jumper cords, data cables, duck head cables, braided power cords, and type-C products. It serves electrical vehicles, data centers, computer peripherals, smart and IOT appliances, and smart phones application. Longwell Company was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 36, Chang An East Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 104
